caption: The video tells of the recruit who was stabbed in the heart in the bunker, crawled out of the bunker and walked into the trench, where he looked out at the ruined battlefield and saw a poster of a woman blowing in the wind. Later in the field, another recruit, walking in the dilapidated trenches, saw the dead recruit who had been stabbed through the heart, and put his silk scarf around his neck.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, decades ago, now, or in the future?
global.answer: It happens decades ago, most likely during a world war.

global.question: Are there more then three different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than five different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.question: Is it day time or night time?
Is there more than five people(including backgrounds)?
Is it day time or night time?
how many people appear in the scene(not including background)?
Is it day time or night time?
Is it day time or night time?
